entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0124.9585] The element FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent with a value of 269,000 and the Balance Sheet Location Axis with the member mtex:CurrentportionofcapitalleasesMember only appears in the balance sheet line item represented by the member. The Balance Sheet Location Axis should be used when the FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent amount is split across multiple Balance Sheet line items. When the amount is not spread across multiple line items then the FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrentStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList item should be used with a value of the element name of the Balance Sheet line item.
Period :2023-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:BalanceSheetLocationAxis=mtex:CurrentportionofcapitalleasesMember Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9585 Rule version: 26.0.9 - mtex-20241231.htm 8

[DQC.US.0124.9585] The element FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent with a value of 275,000 and the Balance Sheet Location Axis with the member mtex:CurrentportionofcapitalleasesMember only appears in the balance sheet line item represented by the member. The Balance Sheet Location Axis should be used when the FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent amount is split across multiple Balance Sheet line items. When the amount is not spread across multiple line items then the FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrentStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleList item should be used with a value of the element name of the Balance Sheet line item.
Period :2024-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:BalanceSheetLocationAxis=mtex:CurrentportionofcapitalleasesMember Unit : USD Decimals: -3
Rule Element Id:9585 Rule version: 26.0.9 - mtex-20241231.htm 8
